name: Gotham House Blend Toro
additionalNotes:
We wanted something special for Gotham Cigars so I called my good friend Kaizer, who makes Gurkha cigars, and asked “What do you have that’s special? Something that you consider to be affordable and still maintain the great Gurkha taste?"
He replied “Manny, I am going to make a unique cigar for you; a cigar that only you will have. We will call it The Gurkha House Blend!”
